6242<noscript>

6301<div class="margin-top margin-bottom Catalog_seoContentBlock__LU2U7" style="word-break:break-word">

6302<div>

6303<div style="width:80%; margin:auto; margin-top: 120px; margin-bottom: 120px;">

6304

6305<p>

6306Vevano Home carries only the best when it comes to washlets and bidets. Our selection includes everything from luxury bidet-toilet combos, to easy-to-install washlet seats, to cost-effective bidet seat attachments.&nbsp;</p>

6307

6308

6309<p>

6310&nbsp;</p>

6311

6312

6313<p>

6314Browse our selection or continue reading for help finding the perfect bidet for your bathroom.</p>

6315

6316

6317<p>

6318&nbsp;</p>

6319

6320

6321<h2>

6322What is a Bidet?</h2>

6323

6324

6325<p>

6326A bidet (pronounced &ldquo;buh-day&rdquo;) is a bathroom fixture that, at its most basic level, sprays water on your lower regions for a more thorough (and gentle) cleansing than wiping with toilet paper. Many bidets include bonus features, such as an air-drying function or toilet bowl disinfectant.</p>

6327

6328

6329<p>

6330&nbsp;</p>

6331

6332

6333<p>

6334Traditional bidets are standalone plumbing fixtures that sit beside the toilet and have their own basin and a water spout. However, many modern bidets are integrated with the toilet or can be installed as a bidet toilet seat. These kinds of bidets rely on a retractable bidet wand (small water nozzle) to spray water from inside the toilet bowl.</p>

6335

6336

6337<p>

6338&nbsp;</p>

6339

6340

6341<h2>

6342Types of Bidets</h2>

6343

6344

6345<h3>

6346Bidet Toilets</h3>

6347

6348

6349<p>

6350<img alt="Toto Neorest RH Bidet Toilet" src="https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/21488/Image/21488-13.png" style="width: 200px; height: 218px;" />

6351</p>

6352

6353

6354<p>

6355<strong>

6356Average Cost:</strong>

6357 $1200&mdash;$7000</p>

6358

6359

6360<p>

6361Bidet-toilet combos, or bidet toilets, are one-piece or two-piece toilets with a built-in bidet. The bidet nozzle is controlled by either a remote or side panel. Many bidet toilets offer a variety of customization, so you can choose between rear and front cleanse, adjust the water temperature and pressure, and modify the washlet spray mode.</p>

6362

6363

6364<p>

6365&nbsp;</p>

6366

6367

6368<p>

6369Often, bidet-toilet combinations include a host of other <a href="https://vevano.com/resource-center/best-smart-toilet-technology/">

6370smart toilet</a>

6371 features, including a warm air dryer function and automatic air deodorizers. The popular <a href="https://vevano.com/resource-center/toto-neorest-toilet/">

6372Neorest collection</a>

6373, for example, are sleek, low-profile Toto bidet-toilet combos with heated seat, automatic open and close lid for hands-free operation, and two user-memory settings so you can save your bidet preferences.</p>

6374

6375

6376<p>

6377&nbsp;</p>

6378

6379

6380<h3>

6381Bidet Toilet Seat</h3>

6382

6383

6384<p>

6385<img alt="Toto C2 Elongated Bidet Washlet Seat" src="https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/38064/Image/38064-5.jpg" style="width: 200px; height: 200px;" />

6386</p>

6387

6388

6389<p>

6390<strong>

6391Average Cost:</strong>

6392 $350-$500 ; Cost Range: $60-$1000</p>

6393

6394

6395<p>

6396Bidet toilet seats, also called a bidet seat, are an affordable way to add smart toilet functionality without completely replacing your toilet or installing new plumbing. Bidet toilet seats are installed on top of your existing toilet bowl, replacing standard toilet seats with a more functional (and often more comfortable) seat. Like bidet toilets, bidet toilet seats come with retractable bidet nozzles for cleansing and can include various other built-in features, including a heated seat, warm air dryer, automatic deodorizer, and washlet spray customization.</p>

6397

6398

6399<p>

6400&nbsp;</p>

6401

6402

6403<p>

6404When shopping for a bidet toilet seat, it is essential you measure your toilet correctly so you can find the right size. Some toilets are designed for easy bidet seat integration. For example, Toto&rsquo;s popular Washlet+ series are designed to seamlessly install on most Toto toilets&mdash;although you can still purchase and install <a href="https://vevano.com/resource-center/toto-washlet-comparison/">

6405Toto bidet toilet seats</a>

6406 even if you don&rsquo;t have a Toto toilet, as long as you find the right size.</p>

6407

6408

6409<p>

6410&nbsp;</p>

6411

6412

6413<p>

6414Thankfully, many companies include a toilet seat fit chart and easy measurement instructions for a seamless bidet toilet seat installation.</p>

6415

6416

6417<p>

6418&nbsp;</p>

6419

6420

6421<h3>

6422Bidet Attachment</h3>

6423

6424

6425<p>

6426<img alt="Brondell FreshSpa Bidet Toilet Attachment in White" src="https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Brondell/Brondell/35705/Image/35705-1.jpg" style="width: 200px; height: 200px;" />

6427</p>

6428

6429

6430<p>

6431<strong>

6432Average Cost:</strong>

6433 $60-$150</p>

6434

6435

6436<p>

6437Bidet attachments integrate with your toilet seat and usually provide only one water nozzle and a simple side panel for control. These low-cost washlets are installed between your toilet seat and toilet bowl and can start as low as $60. <a href="https://vevano.com/product/35706-lh-20-southspa-bidet-toilet-attachment-in-white/">

6438Brondell&rsquo;s bidet toilet attachments</a>

6439 are a popular example of these kinds of washlets. Though limited, Brondell&rsquo;s washlet attachment still offers adjustable temperature and pressure controls.</p>

6440

6441

6442<p>

6443&nbsp;</p>

6444

6445

6446<h3>

6447Standalone Bidet</h3>

6448

6449

6450<p>

6451<img alt="Toto Piedmont Deck-Mount Flushing Rim Vertical-Spray Bidet in Cotton White" src="https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/21476/Image/21476-1.png" style="width: 200px; height: 200px;" />

6452</p>

6453

6454

6455<p>

6456<strong>

6457Average Cost:</strong>

6458 $250-$700</p>

6459

6460

6461<p>

6462Standalone bidets are plumbing fixtures with their own basin and water faucet for cleaning. They may look like a low sink or a lid-less, tankless toilet. These bidets are separate from the toilet and require additional plumbing that most homes in the U.S. do not already have.</p>

6463

6464

6465<p>

6466&nbsp;</p>

6467

6468

6469<h2>

6470Luxury Bidet Features</h2>

6471

6472

6473<p>

6474Bidets on their own are considered a sophisticated smart toilet feature. Many bidet toilets or washlet seats and attachments come with a host of other bonus comfort and sanitary features. Below are some other features you&rsquo;re likely to find with your brand-new bidet:</p>

6475

6476

6477<ul>

6478

6479 <li>

6480Heated Seat Temperature Control</li>

6481

6482 <li>

6483Adjustable Water Temperature</li>

6484

6485 <li>

6486Adjustable Water Pressure</li>

6487

6488 <li>

6489Multiple Spray Modes</li>

6490

6491 <li>

6492Dual Nozzles for Front and Rear Cleanse</li>

6493

6494 <li>

6495Self-Cleaning Technology (for the water nozzle or toilet bowl)</li>

6496

6497 <li>

6498Air deodorizers</li>

6499

6500 <li>

6501Night Lights</li>

6502

6503 <li>

6504Automatic Seat</li>

6505

6506</ul>

6507

6508

6509<p>

6510&nbsp;</p>

6511

6512

6513<h2>

6514Best Bidet Brands</h2>

6515

6516

6517<h3>

6518Toto</h3>

6519

6520

6521<p>

6522For over one hundred years, Toto has led the world in innovative, eco-friendly toilet technology. The company, which started in 1912, specializes in developing bidets, toilets, and other bathroom fixtures that combine the best of hygienic performance and luxury, comfortable functionality. Their most popular products include their sleek bidet-toilet Neorest collection, which includes the luxurious <a href="https://vevano.com/product/21487-ms900cumfg01-neorest-nx1-elongated-dual-flush-integrated-bidet-seat-one-piece-toilet-in-cotton-white/">

6523Neorest NX1</a>

6524, and their easy-to-install bidet seats ranging from the <a href="https://vevano.com/product/38064-sw307401-washlet-c2-elongated-electronic-bidet-seat-in-cotton-white/">

6525Toto Washlet C2</a>

6526 to the high-end luxury <a href="https://vevano.com/product/21022-sw305401-washlet-s550e-elongated-electronic-classic-bidet-seat-in-cotton-white/">

6527Toto Washlet s550e</a>

6528.</p>

6529

6530

6531<p>

6532&nbsp;</p>

6533

6534

6535<h3>

6536Kohler</h3>

6537

6538

6539<p>

6540Kohler is one of the most trusted names in toilet manufacturing. Since their humble beginnings in 1873, the company has put forth products that blend elegance with efficiency. Their striving for excellence is especially apparent with their luxury bidet seats and bidet toilets, which includes the modern <a href="https://vevano.com/product/38384-5401-pa-0-veil-elongated-08-gpf-128-gpf-dual-flush-bidet-bowl-toilet-in-white/">

6541Kohler Veil Dual-Flush Bidet Toilet</a>

6542 and luxurious <a href="https://vevano.com/product/38206-4108-0-c3-230-elongated-electronic-bidet-seat-in-white/">

6543Kohler C3-230 Bidet Seat</a>

6544.</p>

6545

6546

6547<p>

6548&nbsp;</p>

6549

6550

6551<h3>

6552Bio Bidet</h3>

6553

6554

6555<p>

6556Though relatively new on the scene&mdash;having started in 2008&mdash;Bio Bidet has earned their place in the bidet industry for their dedication to advanced bidet technology, eco-friendly functionality, and enhanced bathroom comfort features. Their forward-thinking bidet products include the sleek <a href="https://vevano.com/product/37558-bb-dls-ew-discovery-dls-elongated-bidet-seat-in-white/">

6557Bio Bidet Discover DLS Bidet Seat</a>

6558 and high-tech <a href="https://vevano.com/product/37553-bb-1000-rw-supreme-round-bidet-seat-in-white/">

6559Bio Bidet Supreme Round Bidet Seat</a>

6560.</p>

6561

6562

6563<p>

6564&nbsp;</p>

6565

6566

6567<h3>

6568Alpha Bidet</h3>

6569

6570

6571<p>

6572Alpha Bidet is dedicated to making the bidet accessible to all countries, including the United States. The company specializes in creating products that are easy to install and have all the bells and whistles of high-end, luxury standalone bidets or bidet toilets. Their bidet toilet seats have a clean, seamless appearance. Their <a href="https://vevano.com/product/37565-jx-ew-alpha-jx-elongated-bidet-seat-in-white/">

6573Alpha JX Elongated Bidet Seat</a>

6574 is particularly sought after, although the <a href="https://vevano.com/product/37560-gx-wave-rw-alpha-gx-wave-round-bidet-seat-in-white/">

6575Alpha GX Wave Bidet Seat</a>

6576 is quickly rising in rank on best bidet lists.</p>

6577

6578

6579<p>

6580&nbsp;</p>

6581

6582

6583<h2>

6584Benefits of Using a Bidet</h2>

6585

6586

6587<h3>

6588Bidets Are More Hygienic</h3>

6589

6590

6591<p>

6592Bidets provide a <a href="https://vevano.com/resource-center/bidets-versus-toilets/">

6593better cleansing experience</a>

6594 than wiping with toilet paper. Additionally, bidets reduce and help prevent hemorrhoids, rashes, and other infections that can be caused by toilet paper. Bidets are especially helpful for people who lack range of motion.</p>

6595

6596

6597<p>

6598&nbsp;</p>

6599

6600

6601<h3>

6602Bidets Are More Eco-Friendly</h3>

6603

6604

6605<p>

6606Though seemingly counter-intuitive, bidets save water, using about ⅛ of a gallon per use. This is in part because it can take up to 20,000 gallons of water and 17 trees to make one ton of toilet paper. Switching to bidets can help reduce toilet paper production, in effect saving more water (and more money) in the long run.</p>

6607

6608

6609<p>

6610&nbsp;</p>

6611

6612

6613<p>

6614Additionally, many bidets include <a href="https://vevano.com/resource-center/eco-friendly-toilets/">

6615eco-friendly toilet</a>

6616 cleaning features, such as premisting the bowl to reduce waste build-up or sanitizing the bowl after each use with gentle cleaning agents. These cleaning technologies help reduce the need for harsh cleaning chemicals.</p>

6617

6618

6619<p>

6620&nbsp;</p>

6621

6622

6623<h3>

6624Bidets Enhance Your Comfort</h3>

6625

6626

6627<p>

6628Not only is the bidet&rsquo;s cleaning method gentler and more effective than toilet paper, but many bidets include a host of other luxury comfort features. It&rsquo;s not uncommon to find bidets with built-in ambient nightlights, heated seats, automatic deodorizers, and automatic seats.</p>

6629

6630

6631<p>

6632&nbsp;</p>

6633

6634

6635<h2>

6636How to Use a Bidet</h2>

6637

6638

6639<p>

6640Although your experience may vary if you own a standalone bidet, the following how-to applies to most bidet toilets and bidet seats or attachments. Our guide covers the basics, but keep in mind that some bidets include more spray and luxury customization than others.</p>

6641

6642

6643<ol>

6644

6645 <li>

6646<strong>

6647Begin your bathroom business as usual.</strong>

6648 Enter the bathroom and sit on your toilet as you would at the start of any restroom visit.</li>

6649

6650 <li>

6651<strong>

6652Remain seated.</strong>

6653 Once you have finished eliminating waste from your body, remain seated on the toilet. Note: This only applies to bidets with retractable water nozzles that are located in the toilet. If you own a standalone bidet, you will need to relocate to the small wash basin beside your toilet to complete your cleanse.</li>

6654

6655 <li>

6656<strong>

6657Activate the water nozzle. </strong>

6658Using either the side panel or bidet remote control, identify and press the &ldquo;wash&rdquo; button. Most bidet controls indicate the wash function by depicting water in the form of small dotted lines (wavy lines usually refer to the air drying function, if the bidet includes one).</li>

6659

6660 <li>

6661<strong>

6662Adjust the bidet spray.</strong>

6663 Your bidet likely has an option to adjust the water pressure. You may need to adjust your body as well for optimal effect. Depending on the bidet, you may be able to select between front or rear spray and various spray modes, including a pulsating and oscillating mode. While remaining seated, consider testing the various bidet spray modes until you reach your ideal comfort level.</li>

6664

6665 <li>

6666<strong>

6667Dry yourself. </strong>

6668Your bidet may include an air drying function, usually indicated by an image of wavy lines. You can use this to dry or instead gently pat the wet areas with toilet paper until dry.</li>

6669

6670 <li>

6671<strong>

6672Turn off your bidet and flush the toilet.</strong>

6673 At this point, you have successfully used a bidet! Ensure that all bidet settings are off, including the air dry function, heated seat function, or otherwise.</li>

6674

6675</ol>

6676

6677

6678<p>

6679&nbsp;</p>

6680

6681

6682<h2>

6683FAQ</h2>

6684

6685

6686<h3>

6687<em>

6688How do I install a bidet?</em>

6689</h3>

6690

6691

6692<p>

6693Your bidet installation depends on what kind of bidet you plan to use. All bidets require access to water, whether it&rsquo;s the existing water hookup your toilet uses or an additional water supply hook-up beside it. Your bidet may also require a nearby electrical outlet and a specific type of valve to allow for warm water temperature control.</p>

6694

6695

6696<p>

6697&nbsp;</p>

6698

6699

6700<p>

6701Before purchasing a new bidet, ensure you understand the installation requirements so you can use your bidet to the utmost potential.</p>

6702

6703

6704<p>

6705&nbsp;</p>

6706

6707

6708<h3>

6709<em>

6710How much is a bidet?</em>

6711</h3>

6712

6713

6714<p>

6715Bidet seat attachments start at around $60. Bidet toilet seats can range from $60 to over $1000, but most bidet seats fall between $350-$500. Bidet toilets start at around $1000 and can go as high as $7000 or more, depending on the luxury and hygienic features you desire.</p>

6716

6717

6718<p>

6719&nbsp;</p>

6720

6721

6722<h3>

6723<em>

6724Are bidets worth it?</em>

6725</h3>

6726

6727

6728<p>

6729Bidets are a win-win-win for you, your bathroom&rsquo;s cleanliness, and the planet as a whole. Not only do bidets streamline your bathroom experience and provide a more sanitary and comfortable clean, but bidets help reduce toilet paper waste and overall water usage.</p>

6730

6731

6732<p>

6733&nbsp;</p>

6734

6735

6736<h3>

6737<em>

6738Are bidet toilets sanitary?</em>

6739</h3>

6740

6741

6742<p>

6743In many ways, bidet toilets are more sanitary than the average toilet. Not only do bidets provide a more thorough and gentle clean than wiping with toilet paper, but many bidets include innovative self-cleaning technologies and other features that facilitate a better bathroom experience.</p>

6744

6745

6746<p>

6747&nbsp;</p>

6748

6749

6750<p>

6751For example, some bidets include a premisting feature that sprays the bowl with water before use to help reduce waste build-up. After each use, some Toto washlets even mist the bowl with an eco-friendly disinfectant called eWater+. Various luxury bidets also have automatic seats or remote controls, minimizing your overall contact with the toilet by encouraging touch-free operation.</p>

6752

6753

6754<p>

6755&nbsp;</p>

6756

6757

6758<h3>

6759<em>

6760Do you still have to wipe with a bidet?</em>

6761</h3>

6762

6763

6764<p>

6765Many washlets or bidets come with an air drying function, preventing the need for toilet paper to wipe dry. However, many still use a small amount of toilet paper to pat dry after using a bidet.</p>

6766

6767

6768<p>

6769&nbsp;</p>

6770

6771

6772<h3>

6773<em>

6774Which bidet brand is best?</em>

6775</h3>

6776

6777

6778<p>

6779Toto has a remarkable reputation for bidet and toilet technology, having started in Japan where bidets are incredibly common. Kohler is another well-established brand with sophisticated, luxury bidet technology. However, many newer companies, including Bio Bidet and Alpha Bidet, offer just as innovative technology as some of the leading toilet brands in the industry.</p>

6780

6781</div>

6782

6783</div>

6784</div>

6785</div>

6786</div>

6787</div>

6788</div>

6789</div>

6790</main>

6791</div>

Our selection includes everything from luxury bidet-toilet combos, to easy-to-install washlet seats, to cost-effective bidet seat attachments.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBrowse our selection or continue reading for help finding the perfect bidet for your bathroom.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch2\u003eWhat is a Bidet?\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eA bidet (pronounced \u0026ldquo;buh-day\u0026rdquo;) is a bathroom fixture that, at its most basic level, sprays water on your lower regions for a more thorough (and gentle) cleansing than wiping with toilet paper. Many bidets include bonus features, such as an air-drying function or toilet bowl disinfectant.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eTraditional bidets are standalone plumbing fixtures that sit beside the toilet and have their own basin and a water spout. However, many modern bidets are integrated with the toilet or can be installed as a bidet toilet seat. These kinds of bidets rely on a retractable bidet wand (small water nozzle) to spray water from inside the toilet bowl.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch2\u003eTypes of Bidets\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eBidet Toilets\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg alt=\"Toto Neorest RH Bidet Toilet\" src=\"https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/21488/Image/21488-13.png\" style=\"width: 200px; height: 218px;\" /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAverage Cost:\u003c/strong\u003e $1200\u0026mdash;$7000\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBidet-toilet combos, or bidet toilets, are one-piece or two-piece toilets with a built-in bidet. The bidet nozzle is controlled by either a remote or side panel. Many bidet toilets offer a variety of customization, so you can choose between rear and front cleanse, adjust the water temperature and pressure, and modify the washlet spray mode.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eOften, bidet-toilet combinations include a host of other \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/resource-center/best-smart-toilet-technology/\"\u003esmart toilet\u003c/a\u003e features, including a warm air dryer function and automatic air deodorizers. The popular \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/resource-center/toto-neorest-toilet/\"\u003eNeorest collection\u003c/a\u003e, for example, are sleek, low-profile Toto bidet-toilet combos with heated seat, automatic open and close lid for hands-free operation, and two user-memory settings so you can save your bidet preferences.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eBidet Toilet Seat\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg alt=\"Toto C2 Elongated Bidet Washlet Seat\" src=\"https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/38064/Image/38064-5.jpg\" style=\"width: 200px; height: 200px;\" /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAverage Cost:\u003c/strong\u003e $350-$500 ; Cost Range: $60-$1000\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBidet toilet seats, also called a bidet seat, are an affordable way to add smart toilet functionality without completely replacing your toilet or installing new plumbing. Bidet toilet seats are installed on top of your existing toilet bowl, replacing standard toilet seats with a more functional (and often more comfortable) seat. Like bidet toilets, bidet toilet seats come with retractable bidet nozzles for cleansing and can include various other built-in features, including a heated seat, warm air dryer, automatic deodorizer, and washlet spray customization.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eWhen shopping for a bidet toilet seat, it is essential you measure your toilet correctly so you can find the right size. Some toilets are designed for easy bidet seat integration. For example, Toto\u0026rsquo;s popular Washlet+ series are designed to seamlessly install on most Toto toilets\u0026mdash;although you can still purchase and install \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/resource-center/toto-washlet-comparison/\"\u003eToto bidet toilet seats\u003c/a\u003e even if you don\u0026rsquo;t have a Toto toilet, as long as you find the right size.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThankfully, many companies include a toilet seat fit chart and easy measurement instructions for a seamless bidet toilet seat installation.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eBidet Attachment\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg alt=\"Brondell FreshSpa Bidet Toilet Attachment in White\" src=\"https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Brondell/Brondell/35705/Image/35705-1.jpg\" style=\"width: 200px; height: 200px;\" /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAverage Cost:\u003c/strong\u003e $60-$150\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBidet attachments integrate with your toilet seat and usually provide only one water nozzle and a simple side panel for control. These low-cost washlets are installed between your toilet seat and toilet bowl and can start as low as $60. \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/35706-lh-20-southspa-bidet-toilet-attachment-in-white/\"\u003eBrondell\u0026rsquo;s bidet toilet attachments\u003c/a\u003e are a popular example of these kinds of washlets. Though limited, Brondell\u0026rsquo;s washlet attachment still offers adjustable temperature and pressure controls.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eStandalone Bidet\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg alt=\"Toto Piedmont Deck-Mount Flushing Rim Vertical-Spray Bidet in Cotton White\" src=\"https://image-proxy.vevano.com/500x0,q80,jpeg/https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/21476/Image/21476-1.png\" style=\"width: 200px; height: 200px;\" /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAverage Cost:\u003c/strong\u003e $250-$700\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eStandalone bidets are plumbing fixtures with their own basin and water faucet for cleaning. They may look like a low sink or a lid-less, tankless toilet. These bidets are separate from the toilet and require additional plumbing that most homes in the U.S. do not already have.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch2\u003eLuxury Bidet Features\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBidets on their own are considered a sophisticated smart toilet feature. Many bidet toilets or washlet seats and attachments come with a host of other bonus comfort and sanitary features. Below are some other features you\u0026rsquo;re likely to find with your brand-new bidet:\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cul\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eHeated Seat Temperature Control\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eAdjustable Water Temperature\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eAdjustable Water Pressure\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eMultiple Spray Modes\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eDual Nozzles for Front and Rear Cleanse\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eSelf-Cleaning Technology (for the water nozzle or toilet bowl)\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eAir deodorizers\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eNight Lights\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003eAutomatic Seat\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch2\u003eBest Bidet Brands\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eToto\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eFor over one hundred years, Toto has led the world in innovative, eco-friendly toilet technology. The company, which started in 1912, specializes in developing bidets, toilets, and other bathroom fixtures that combine the best of hygienic performance and luxury, comfortable functionality. Their most popular products include their sleek bidet-toilet Neorest collection, which includes the luxurious \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/21487-ms900cumfg01-neorest-nx1-elongated-dual-flush-integrated-bidet-seat-one-piece-toilet-in-cotton-white/\"\u003eNeorest NX1\u003c/a\u003e, and their easy-to-install bidet seats ranging from the \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/38064-sw307401-washlet-c2-elongated-electronic-bidet-seat-in-cotton-white/\"\u003eToto Washlet C2\u003c/a\u003e to the high-end luxury \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/21022-sw305401-washlet-s550e-elongated-electronic-classic-bidet-seat-in-cotton-white/\"\u003eToto Washlet s550e\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eKohler\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eKohler is one of the most trusted names in toilet manufacturing. Since their humble beginnings in 1873, the company has put forth products that blend elegance with efficiency. Their striving for excellence is especially apparent with their luxury bidet seats and bidet toilets, which includes the modern \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/38384-5401-pa-0-veil-elongated-08-gpf-128-gpf-dual-flush-bidet-bowl-toilet-in-white/\"\u003eKohler Veil Dual-Flush Bidet Toilet\u003c/a\u003e and luxurious \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/38206-4108-0-c3-230-elongated-electronic-bidet-seat-in-white/\"\u003eKohler C3-230 Bidet Seat\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eBio Bidet\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThough relatively new on the scene\u0026mdash;having started in 2008\u0026mdash;Bio Bidet has earned their place in the bidet industry for their dedication to advanced bidet technology, eco-friendly functionality, and enhanced bathroom comfort features. Their forward-thinking bidet products include the sleek \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/37558-bb-dls-ew-discovery-dls-elongated-bidet-seat-in-white/\"\u003eBio Bidet Discover DLS Bidet Seat\u003c/a\u003e and high-tech \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/37553-bb-1000-rw-supreme-round-bidet-seat-in-white/\"\u003eBio Bidet Supreme Round Bidet Seat\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eAlpha Bidet\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAlpha Bidet is dedicated to making the bidet accessible to all countries, including the United States. The company specializes in creating products that are easy to install and have all the bells and whistles of high-end, luxury standalone bidets or bidet toilets. Their bidet toilet seats have a clean, seamless appearance. Their \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/37565-jx-ew-alpha-jx-elongated-bidet-seat-in-white/\"\u003eAlpha JX Elongated Bidet Seat\u003c/a\u003e is particularly sought after, although the \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/product/37560-gx-wave-rw-alpha-gx-wave-round-bidet-seat-in-white/\"\u003eAlpha GX Wave Bidet Seat\u003c/a\u003e is quickly rising in rank on best bidet lists.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch2\u003eBenefits of Using a Bidet\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eBidets Are More Hygienic\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBidets provide a \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/resource-center/bidets-versus-toilets/\"\u003ebetter cleansing experience\u003c/a\u003e than wiping with toilet paper. Additionally, bidets reduce and help prevent hemorrhoids, rashes, and other infections that can be caused by toilet paper. Bidets are especially helpful for people who lack range of motion.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eBidets Are More Eco-Friendly\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThough seemingly counter-intuitive, bidets save water, using about ⅛ of a gallon per use. This is in part because it can take up to 20,000 gallons of water and 17 trees to make one ton of toilet paper. Switching to bidets can help reduce toilet paper production, in effect saving more water (and more money) in the long run.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAdditionally, many bidets include \u003ca href=\"https://vevano.com/resource-center/eco-friendly-toilets/\"\u003eeco-friendly toilet\u003c/a\u003e cleaning features, such as premisting the bowl to reduce waste build-up or sanitizing the bowl after each use with gentle cleaning agents. These cleaning technologies help reduce the need for harsh cleaning chemicals.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003eBidets Enhance Your Comfort\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eNot only is the bidet\u0026rsquo;s cleaning method gentler and more effective than toilet paper, but many bidets include a host of other luxury comfort features. It\u0026rsquo;s not uncommon to find bidets with built-in ambient nightlights, heated seats, automatic deodorizers, and automatic seats.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch2\u003eHow to Use a Bidet\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAlthough your experience may vary if you own a standalone bidet, the following how-to applies to most bidet toilets and bidet seats or attachments. Our guide covers the basics, but keep in mind that some bidets include more spray and luxury customization than others.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003col\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eBegin your bathroom business as usual.\u003c/strong\u003e Enter the bathroom and sit on your toilet as you would at the start of any restroom visit.\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eRemain seated.\u003c/strong\u003e Once you have finished eliminating waste from your body, remain seated on the toilet. Note: This only applies to bidets with retractable water nozzles that are located in the toilet. If you own a standalone bidet, you will need to relocate to the small wash basin beside your toilet to complete your cleanse.\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eActivate the water nozzle. \u003c/strong\u003eUsing either the side panel or bidet remote control, identify and press the \u0026ldquo;wash\u0026rdquo; button. Most bidet controls indicate the wash function by depicting water in the form of small dotted lines (wavy lines usually refer to the air drying function, if the bidet includes one).\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAdjust the bidet spray.\u003c/strong\u003e Your bidet likely has an option to adjust the water pressure. You may need to adjust your body as well for optimal effect. Depending on the bidet, you may be able to select between front or rear spray and various spray modes, including a pulsating and oscillating mode. While remaining seated, consider testing the various bidet spray modes until you reach your ideal comfort level.\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eDry yourself. \u003c/strong\u003eYour bidet may include an air drying function, usually indicated by an image of wavy lines. You can use this to dry or instead gently pat the wet areas with toilet paper until dry.\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTurn off your bidet and flush the toilet.\u003c/strong\u003e At this point, you have successfully used a bidet! Ensure that all bidet settings are off, including the air dry function, heated seat function, or otherwise.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ol\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch2\u003eFAQ\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cem\u003eHow do I install a bidet?\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eYour bidet installation depends on what kind of bidet you plan to use. All bidets require access to water, whether it\u0026rsquo;s the existing water hookup your toilet uses or an additional water supply hook-up beside it. Your bidet may also require a nearby electrical outlet and a specific type of valve to allow for warm water temperature control.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBefore purchasing a new bidet, ensure you understand the installation requirements so you can use your bidet to the utmost potential.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cem\u003eHow much is a bidet?\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBidet seat attachments start at around $60. Bidet toilet seats can range from $60 to over $1000, but most bidet seats fall between $350-$500. Bidet toilets start at around $1000 and can go as high as $7000 or more, depending on the luxury and hygienic features you desire.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cem\u003eAre bidets worth it?\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBidets are a win-win-win for you, your bathroom\u0026rsquo;s cleanliness, and the planet as a whole. Not only do bidets streamline your bathroom experience and provide a more sanitary and comfortable clean, but bidets help reduce toilet paper waste and overall water usage.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cem\u003eAre bidet toilets sanitary?\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn many ways, bidet toilets are more sanitary than the average toilet. Not only do bidets provide a more thorough and gentle clean than wiping with toilet paper, but many bidets include innovative self-cleaning technologies and other features that facilitate a better bathroom experience.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eFor example, some bidets include a premisting feature that sprays the bowl with water before use to help reduce waste build-up. After each use, some Toto washlets even mist the bowl with an eco-friendly disinfectant called eWater+. Various luxury bidets also have automatic seats or remote controls, minimizing your overall contact with the toilet by encouraging touch-free operation.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cem\u003eDo you still have to wipe with a bidet?\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eMany washlets or bidets come with an air drying function, preventing the need for toilet paper to wipe dry. However, many still use a small amount of toilet paper to pat dry after using a bidet.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cem\u003eWhich bidet brand is best?\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eToto has a remarkable reputation for bidet and toilet technology, having started in Japan where bidets are incredibly common. Kohler is another well-established brand with sophisticated, luxury bidet technology. However, many newer companies, including Bio Bidet and Alpha Bidet, offer just as innovative technology as some of the leading toilet brands in the industry.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n"},"template":"6088b307a2dea60017981c52","flyoutImage":[{"id":"new- UWQZNM300LDKSYYEDE9 "}],"hidden":null,"keywords":null,"shippingMessage":null,"templateEnabled":null,"thumbnail":null,"translationmap":{},"useShippingRules":null,"robots":null,"id":"5db338b006316d0010d7f36b"},"products":[{"uniqueId":"38066","id":"6042a254bcc97500101f5285","sku":"38066","title":"Washlet C5 Elongated Electronic Bidet Seat in Cotton White","parentName":"Washlet C5 Elongated Electronic Bidet Seat in Cotton White","parentImage":"https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/38066/Image/38066-1.jpg","price":780,"ourPrice":780,"microPrice":0,"salePrice":468,"microPriceUnit":"","priceUnit":"","map":468,"mapEnforced":"false","finalPrice":468,"lowestFinalPrice":468,"highestFinalPrice":468,"discount":0,"description":"Enhance your bathroom experience with the Toto Washlet C5’s top-of-the-line bidet technology. Toto Washlet + C5 Elongated Electronic Bidet seat is the perfect addition to your bathroom. Designed for a seamless installation with a Toto T40 toilet, this bidet seat will provide comfort with every use. This high-tech bidet seat includes an on-demand remote function, adjustable water temperature, and air drying with three variable temperature settings. The convenient and slim wireless remote has an illuminated touchpad that will encompass all of your needs. The eWater+ mists on the wand and toilet bowl are self-cleaning features that are triggered after each flush, which reduces the need for harsh cleaning chemicals. The Premist function sprays the bowl before each use, helping to keep your toilet bowl clean. The automatic air deodorizer keeps the area clean and fresh as well. With an elongated heated seat with temperature control, this Toto washlet suits all your personalized needs. The C5 provides a satisfying cleansing experience every time. This product is the new version of the C200. Designed for a seamless installation with a Toto T40 toilet, this bidet seat will provide comfort with every use. This high-tech bidet seat includes an on-demand remote function, adjustable water temperature, and air drying with three variable temperature settings. The convenient and slim wireless remote has an illuminated touchpad that will encompass all of your needs. The eWater+ mists on the wand and toilet bowl are self-cleaning features that are triggered after each flush, which reduces the need for harsh cleaning chemicals. The Premist function sprays the bowl before each use, helping to keep your toilet bowl clean. The automatic air deodorizer keeps the area clean and fresh as well. With an elongated heated seat with temperature control, this Toto washlet suits all your personalized needs. The C5 provides a satisfying cleansing experience every time. This product is the new version of the C200. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nThe luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid, nightlight, and self-cleaning capabilities. Browse our full range of cabinets, toilets, sinks, faucets, and more at vevano.com","discount":0,"3_unbxd_sku":["21025"],"type":["Electronic Bidet Seat"],"seat_included":"Yes","color_family":["White"],"metatitle":"Toto Washlet S550e Electronic Bidet Seat with eWater+ and Auto Open/Close Contemporary Lid in Cotton White - SW3056#01","price":1851,"battery_type":"Alkaline","categoryPath1":["Toilets"],"warranty":["1 Year Limited"],"categoryPath2":["Bidets"],"id":"5dbcc19aa92b9800108908ea","sku":"21025","mapEnforced":"false","microPrice":0,"brand":["TOTO"],"prop_65_warning":"Yes","priceUnit":"","shape":["Elongated"],"categoryPath":["Toilets\u003eBidets","Toilets"],"upc":"739268335301","parent_unbxd":false,"parentName":"Washlet S550e Elongated Electronic Contemporary Bidet Seat in Cotton White","lowestFinalPrice":1295.7,"autosuggest":"Washlet S550e Elongated Electronic Contemporary Bidet Seat in Cotton White","autosuggest_unstemmed":"Washlet S550e Elongated Electronic Contemporary Bidet Seat in Cotton White","style":["Contemporary"],"microPriceUnit":"","catlevel2Name":"Bidets","finalPrice":1295.7,"availability":"true","fullDescription":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eToto Model Number: SW3056#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s550e Washlet offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and stylish seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nThe luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid, nightlight, and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn terms of style, the Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market. While the contemporary seat in cotton white offers a sleeker, more sophisticated styling, you can opt for sedona beige or the classic, beveled lid for a more traditional look. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. A testament to Toto's innovation, the modern bidet-toilet combo offers advanced, personalized washlet capabilities and a stunning array of self-cleaning toilet technologies. Nearly every setting on the integrated bidet is customizable, allowing users to adjust the placement of the spray, modify the water temperature and pressure, and choose between oscillating and pulsating spray modes. The bidet seat even includes a warm air dryer with five temperature settings, an automatic deodorizer that purifies the air, and an adjustable heated seat! Once you've dialed into your ideal bathroom experience, you can save your preferences using one of the two user memory settings.\u003cbr /\u003e\nAlong with a comfortable and efficient cleansing, the Neorest AH also provides a more sanitary bathroom experience than the average toilet. The automatic open and close lid, coupled with automatic flushing after each use, encourages hands-free operation. To reduce waste build-up, the toilet bowl is coated with the Cefiontect ceramic glaze and is automatically premisted (sprayed with water) before each use. For maximum hygiene, the toilet implements an ultra high efficiency Tornado Flushing system, which easily whisks away debris using centrifugal, cyclonic rinsing action. Although the Neorest AH shares many of the same features and qualities as the Neorest RH, the Toto Neorest AH has a sloped toilet seat and more defined lines than the RH's soft, pebble-like shape. Using a convenient remote control, users can adjust the water temperature, pressure, and spray pattern/direction to their desired cleansing needs. The washlet also includes a warm air dryer function with variable temperature control and a heated seat, automatic deodorizer, and night light for enhanced comfort and usability. For even more convenience, the remote comes with 2 user memory settings so all your cleansing and comfort preferences can be saved and adjusted automatically.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn addition to these luxury bidet features, the Neorest NX1 features innovative self-cleaning technologies, including a Cefiontect ceramic glaze and Premist function that prevents waste from sticking to the bowl’s surface. Using a convenient remote control, users can adjust the water temperature, pressure, and spray pattern/direction to their desired cleansing needs. The washlet also includes a warm air dryer function with variable temperature control and a heated seat, automatic deodorizer, and night light for enhanced comfort and usability. This dual-flush one-piece toilet includes an integrated washlet with all the features you could ask for in a bidet. Equipped with a remote control, users can choose between oscillating and pulsating spray settings, rear and front cleanse, and various water temperature and pressure levels. After cleansing, enjoy a warm air dryer function with five temperature settings. Once you’ve settled on your desired washing and comfort settings, save your preferences using one of the two user memory settings available. In addition to a highly efficient and personalized cleansing, the Neorest 700h offers an adjustable heated seat and automatic deodorizer for enhanced comfort. \u003cbr\u003e\nAs with any Toto toilet, the Toto Neorest 700h incorporates a plethora of innovative self-cleaning technologies. The automatic open and close lid and automatic flushing allows for hygienic, hands-free use of the toilet. A Cefiontect ceramic glaze coats the toilet bowl, helping to prevent waste from sticking to the surface. Before each use, the bowl is automatically premisted to help prevent debris and mold. After flushing, the innovative eWater+ technology helps sanitize the bowl using electrolyzed water. While all impressive, the Neorest 700h’s innovation shines most with its expertly engineered Tornado Flushing system. This incredible feat of toilet technology utilizes two nozzles to generate a powerful cyclonic rinsing, reducing waste build-up and keeping your toilet bowl cleaner, longer. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eNeorest Collection\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eTOTO, the global leader in innovative, high-tech luxury plumbing products, introduces the next generation of its flagship NEOREST Collection. profile. This dual-flush one-piece toilet includes an integrated washlet with all the features you could ask for in a bidet. Equipped with a remote control, users can choose between oscillating and pulsating spray settings, rear and front cleanse, and various water temperature and pressure levels. After cleansing, enjoy a warm air dryer function with five temperature settings. Once you’ve settled on your desired washing and comfort settings, save your preferences using one of the two user memory settings available. In addition to a highly efficient and personalized cleansing, the Neorest 700h offers an adjustable heated seat and automatic deodorizer for enhanced comfort. \u003cbr\u003e\nAs with any Toto toilet, the Toto Neorest 700h incorporates a plethora of innovative self-cleaning technologies. The automatic open and close lid and automatic flushing allows for hygienic, hands-free use of the toilet. A Cefiontect ceramic glaze coats the toilet bowl, helping to prevent waste from sticking to the surface. Before each use, the bowl is automatically premisted to help prevent debris and mold. After flushing, the innovative eWater+ technology helps sanitize the bowl using electrolyzed water. While all impressive, the Neorest 700h’s innovation shines most with its expertly engineered Tornado Flushing system. This incredible feat of toilet technology utilizes two nozzles to generate a powerful cyclonic rinsing, reducing waste build-up and keeping your toilet bowl cleaner, longer. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eNeorest Collection\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eTOTO, the global leader in innovative, high-tech luxury plumbing products, introduces the next generation of its flagship NEOREST Collection. TOTO’s new NEOREST product line offers the TOTO Flotation Tub and NX toiletmost innovative, design forward array of products available with elegant designs drawn from nature, cutting-edge technology, flawless performance, and extraordinary comfort.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. Toto prides itself on engineering products with comfort, cleanliness, and conservation at the forefront of every design.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eFeatures:\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cul\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eCEFIONTECT ceramic glaze prevents particulates from adhering to the porous surfaces, and making it easier to clean.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eTORNADO FLUSH System\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eAutomatic Lid Opening and Closing \u0026 Automatic Flush\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eAir Deodorizer \u0026 Heated Seat\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eRemote Control Operated\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eEWATER+ mists on the wand and toilet bowl, after each flush, to reducing the need for harsh cleaning chemicals.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eNightlight\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eADA Compliant\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eSkirted Design\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eRough-in 12\"\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWater Conservation Requirements\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWater efficiency standards for plumbing products such as faucets, toilets, and showerheads vary state to state. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s500e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nBefore each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. White","style":["Contemporary"],"microPriceUnit":"","catlevel2Name":"Bidets","finalPrice":1180.2,"availability":"true","fullDescription":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eToto Model Number: SW3046#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s500e Washlet offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and stylish seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s500e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nBefore each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\nThough similar in style and functionality to the Toto s550e Washlet, the Toto s500e does not include an automatic lid or night light.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. Toto prides itself on engineering products with comfort, cleanliness, and conservation at the forefront of every design.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eFeatures:\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cul\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eHigh-tech electronic bidet seat\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eEWATER+ mists on the wand and toilet bowl, after each flush, to reducing the need for harsh cleaning chemicals.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eWASHLET cleansing with 5 spray settings\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eBuilt-in air deodorizing system\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003ePREMIST on bowl before each use\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eAdjustable water and seat temperatures\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eWarm-air dryer\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eConvenient magnetic wall mounted cradle\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e2-user personal memory settings\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003eSelf-Cleaning Water Wand\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e","3_unbxd_text":["Electronic Bidet Seat","SW3046#01","Toto Washlet S500e Electronic Elongated Bidet Seat with eWater+ and Contemporary Lid in Cotton White - This bidet seat WASHLET designed to fit WASHLET+ toilet models: Aimes, Aquia, Connelly, Drake, Legato, UltraMax, and Nexus","availability":"true","brand":["TOTO"],"modelnumber":"SW3056AT40#01","shipTypes":["Standard"],"fullDescription":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eToto Model Number: SW3056AT40#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s550e Washlet+ offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and stylish seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. The luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn terms of style, the Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market. While the contemporary seat in cotton white offers a sleeker, more sophisticated styling, you can opt for sedona beige or the classic, beveled lid for a more traditional look. All Toto s550e Washlet models include an LED Night Light.\nNote that the SW3056AT4001 Toto s550e Washlet is the + model, meaning that it is designed to seamlessly integrate with Toto Washlet+ toilet. The Washlet+ cannot be used on incompatible, non-Toto toilets.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. Toto prides itself on engineering products with comfort, cleanliness, and conservation at the forefront of every SW3056AT40#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s550e Washlet+ offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and stylish seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. The luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn terms of style, the Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market. While the contemporary seat in cotton white offers a sleeker, more sophisticated styling, you can opt for sedona beige or the classic, beveled lid for a more traditional look. All Toto s550e Washlet models include an LED Night Light.\nNote that the SW3056AT4001 Toto s550e Washlet is the + model, meaning that it is designed to seamlessly integrate with Toto Washlet+ toilet. The Washlet+ cannot be used on incompatible, non-Toto toilets.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. SW3054#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s550e Washlet offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and uniquely detailed seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nThe luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nThe Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market, coming in a several styles. The SW305401 model features classic, beveled lid for a more traditional or statement look. All Toto s550e Washlet models include an LED Night Light.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. This high-tech bidet seat includes an on-demand remote function, adjustable water temperature, and air drying with three variable temperature settings. The convenient and slim wireless remote has an illuminated touchpad that will encompass all of your needs. The eWater+ mists on the wand and toilet bowl are self-cleaning features that are triggered after each flush, which reduces the need for harsh cleaning chemicals. The Premist function sprays the bowl before each use, helping to keep your toilet bowl clean. The automatic air deodorizer keeps the area clean and fresh as well. With an elongated heated seat with temperature control, this Toto washlet suits all your personalized needs. The C5 provides a satisfying cleansing experience every time. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nThe luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid, nightlight, and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn terms of style, the Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nThe luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid, nightlight, and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn terms of style, the Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market. A testament to Toto's innovation, the modern bidet-toilet combo offers advanced, personalized washlet capabilities and a stunning array of self-cleaning toilet technologies. Nearly every setting on the integrated bidet is customizable, allowing users to adjust the placement of the spray, modify the water temperature and pressure, and choose between oscillating and pulsating spray modes. The bidet seat even includes a warm air dryer with five temperature settings, an automatic deodorizer that purifies the air, and an adjustable heated seat! Once you've dialed into your ideal bathroom experience, you can save your preferences using one of the two user memory settings.\u003cbr /\u003e\nAlong with a comfortable and efficient cleansing, the Neorest AH also provides a more sanitary bathroom experience than the average toilet. The automatic open and close lid, coupled with automatic flushing after each use, encourages hands-free operation. To reduce waste build-up, the toilet bowl is coated with the Cefiontect ceramic glaze and is automatically premisted (sprayed with water) before each use. For maximum hygiene, the toilet implements an ultra high efficiency Tornado Flushing system, which easily whisks away debris using centrifugal, cyclonic rinsing action. Although the Neorest AH shares many of the same features and qualities as the Neorest RH, the Toto Neorest AH has a sloped toilet seat and more defined lines than the RH's soft, pebble-like shape. Using a convenient remote control, users can adjust the water temperature, pressure, and spray pattern/direction to their desired cleansing needs. The washlet also includes a warm air dryer function with variable temperature control and a heated seat, automatic deodorizer, and night light for enhanced comfort and usability. For even more convenience, the remote comes with 2 user memory settings so all your cleansing and comfort preferences can be saved and adjusted automatically.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn addition to these luxury bidet features, the Neorest NX1 features innovative self-cleaning technologies, including a Cefiontect ceramic glaze and Premist function that prevents waste from sticking to the bowl’s surface. Noteworthy for its elegant, elliptical silhouette, its upscale luxury appearance packs a stunning array of functionality, combining the best of advanced washlet technology and toilet hygiene in a sophisticated one-piece design. Using a convenient remote control, users can adjust the water temperature, pressure, and spray pattern/direction to their desired cleansing needs. The washlet also includes a warm air dryer function with variable temperature control and a heated seat, automatic deodorizer, and night light for enhanced comfort and usability. For even more convenience, the remote comes with 2 user memory settings so all your cleansing and comfort preferences can be saved and adjusted automatically.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn addition to these luxury bidet features, the Neorest NX1 features innovative self-cleaning technologies, including a Cefiontect ceramic glaze and Premist function that prevents waste from sticking to the bowl’s surface. Elongated Dual-Flush Integrated Bidet Seat One-Piece Toilet in Cotton White","parentName":"Neorest 700H Elongated Dual-Flush Integrated Bidet Seat One-Piece Toilet in Cotton White","parentImage":"https://cdn.vevano.com/Products/WebImages/Toto/Toto/21490/Image/21490-1.png","price":7660,"ourPrice":7660,"microPrice":0,"salePrice":5745,"microPriceUnit":"","priceUnit":"","map":5745,"mapEnforced":"false","finalPrice":5745,"lowestFinalPrice":5745,"highestFinalPrice":5745,"discount":0,"description":"An integrated toilet with technologically advanced WASHLET, this Neorest is a truly remarkable combination of ecology and luxury. Meeting both ADA and Universal Design needs, people of all ages and abilities can enjoy all of the Neorest innovations, including TOTO's Tornado flushing system, eWater+ Technology, remote control, spray modes including WonderSpin and WonderWave, automatic flushing and CEFIONTECT, an extraordinarily smooth, ion-barrier surface to help keep the bowl cleaner longer.","availability":"true","brand":["TOTO"],"modelnumber":"MS992CUMFG#01","shipTypes":["Standard"],"fullDescription":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eToto Model Number: MS992CUMFG#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eA pinnacle of toilet design, the Toto Neorest 700h stands apart for its advanced washlet technology and sleek, elegant profile. This dual-flush one-piece toilet includes an integrated washlet with all the features you could ask for in a bidet. Equipped with a remote control, users can choose between oscillating and pulsating spray settings, rear and front cleanse, and various water temperature and pressure levels. After cleansing, enjoy a warm air dryer function with five temperature settings. Once you’ve settled on your desired washing and comfort settings, save your preferences using one of the two user memory settings available. In addition to a highly efficient and personalized cleansing, the Neorest 700h offers an adjustable heated seat and automatic deodorizer for enhanced comfort. \u003cbr\u003e\nAs with any Toto toilet, the Toto Neorest 700h incorporates a plethora of innovative self-cleaning technologies. The automatic open and close lid and automatic flushing allows for hygienic, hands-free use of the toilet. A Cefiontect ceramic glaze coats the toilet bowl, helping to prevent waste from sticking to the surface. Before each use, the bowl is automatically premisted to help prevent debris and mold. After flushing, the innovative eWater+ technology helps sanitize the bowl using electrolyzed water. While all impressive, the Neorest 700h’s innovation shines most with its expertly engineered Tornado Flushing system. This incredible feat of toilet technology utilizes two nozzles to generate a powerful cyclonic rinsing, reducing waste build-up and keeping your toilet bowl cleaner, longer. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eNeorest Collection\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eTOTO, the global leader in innovative, high-tech luxury plumbing products, introduces the next generation of its flagship NEOREST Collection. profile. This dual-flush one-piece toilet includes an integrated washlet with all the features you could ask for in a bidet. Equipped with a remote control, users can choose between oscillating and pulsating spray settings, rear and front cleanse, and various water temperature and pressure levels. After cleansing, enjoy a warm air dryer function with five temperature settings. Once you’ve settled on your desired washing and comfort settings, save your preferences using one of the two user memory settings available. The automatic open and close lid and automatic flushing allows for hygienic, hands-free use of the toilet. A Cefiontect ceramic glaze coats the toilet bowl, helping to prevent waste from sticking to the surface. Before each use, the bowl is automatically premisted to help prevent debris and mold. After flushing, the innovative eWater+ technology helps sanitize the bowl using electrolyzed water. While all impressive, the Neorest 700h’s innovation shines most with its expertly engineered Tornado Flushing system. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nBefore each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. SW3046#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s500e Washlet offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and stylish seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s500e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nBefore each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\nThough similar in style and functionality to the Toto s550e Washlet, the Toto s500e does not include an automatic lid or night light.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. Along with these innovative self-cleaning technologies, the Neorest RH boasts an ultra high-efficiency Tornado Flush. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. The luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn terms of style, the Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market. While the contemporary seat in cotton white offers a sleeker, more sophisticated styling, you can opt for sedona beige or the classic, beveled lid for a more traditional look. All Toto s550e Washlet models include an LED Night Light.\nNote that the SW3056AT4001 Toto s550e Washlet is the + model, meaning that it is designed to seamlessly integrate with Toto Washlet+ toilet. SW3056AT40#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s550e Washlet+ offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and stylish seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. The luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nIn terms of style, the Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market. While the contemporary seat in cotton white offers a sleeker, more sophisticated styling, you can opt for sedona beige or the classic, beveled lid for a more traditional look. All Toto s550e Washlet models include an LED Night Light.\nNote that the SW3056AT4001 Toto s550e Washlet is the + model, meaning that it is designed to seamlessly integrate with Toto Washlet+ toilet. The Washlet+ cannot be used on incompatible, non-Toto toilets.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWho is Toto?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFor over 100 years, Toto has led the plumbing industry by creating innovative solutions for your restroom. SW3054#01\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Toto s550e Washlet offers all the bidet functionality you could hope for in a conveniently slim and uniquely detailed seat. Using an illuminated touch-activated remote, you can choose between 5 washlet spray settings and adjust the water temperature and pressure to your desired liking. In addition to a nearly fully-customizable bidet cleanse, the s550e includes a warm air dry function, heated seat, and automatic deodorizer. The remote conveniently includes two user memory options to save preferred settings. \u003cbr\u003e\nThe luxury bidet is made more convenient with its automatic open and close lid and self-cleaning capabilities. Before each use, the bidet wand automatically premists the bowl to reduce waste build-up. Once you are finished with the toilet, the eWater+ feature cleanses the bowl using electrolyzed water, a safe and powerful compound that’s an eco-friendly alternative to harsh cleaning chemicals.\n\u003cbr\u003e\nThe Toto s550e is one of the more versatile bidet seats on the market, coming in a several styles.
